<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Coordinated Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=6361) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=727" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 205 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=254)

**Prerequisites**
[Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6351)

</column>

---

You heroically dash into the fray, inspiring your allies to follow. You [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305) up to your Speed and make a melee [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306). If your Strike hits and damages an enemy, each ally within 60 feet who saw you hit can use a reaction to Stride, but they each must end their Stride closer to the creature you hit than where they started.
name: Coordinated Charge
